availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James A. Duncan (Owen County, Kentucky, attorneyy)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Susan F. Duncan. County attorney of Owen County in 1859 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 2.
John Livingston, Livingston's United States Law Register and Official Directory, (New York, 1859), p. 14.
Find A Grave, "James A. Duncan (1829-1896)," Memorial #77178712, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/77178712 (accessed April 12, 2018).
